long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Comment Exporter, you can extract comments from Facebook Post Page and export them to CSV, Excel, JSON or Google Sheet.
If there are replies to the comment, you can export nested comments.

Comment Exporter provides user-friendly interface and simplifies the process of extracting comments, requiring no coding expertise.

# Features
✓ EXPORT COMMENTS from Facebook Post Page
✓ Export Nesting Comments
✓ Copy to Clipboard (Paste to Google Sheet)	
✓ Export as Excel, CSV, and JSON	

# Supported fields:
- User Id
- Username
- Comment Id
- Comment Text
- Comment attachment (photo、video)
- Reply Count
- Reply Count Total
- Reactions Count
- Comment Depth
- Created Date
- Permalink URL (Link to the comment)
- Profile URL
- etc.

With the Pro version and Check 'Includes Nesting Comments', you can get additional fields for Replied Comment such as:
Parent Comment Id and Parent Comment Author.

# How to get started?
1. Visit the Facebook post page, click on the download icon next to the number of comments.
2. Click Fetch button, then just wait to scrape complete.
3. Once extraction is done, click 'Export'.

If it keeps failing, please send us the corresponding link, and we will do some troubleshooting and compatibility.

For perfect use, it is recommended to set the Facebook language to English.

# Data Privacy
Your data's security is our top priority. Rest assured, all data remains on your device, ensuring 100% privacy and trustworthiness.

# About Pro
Comment Exporter is a paid extension, you can get basic functionality and upgrade to get more functionality.
